articles.title: Watch: Asteroid Explodes Above English Channel, Lights Up Night Sky - NDTV
articles.description: The European Space Agency (ESA) tweeted that it was "a sign of the rapid advancements in global asteroid detection capabilities!"
articles.content:
The video of the asteroid was posted on social media by several users.
